summary: Completed comprehensive testing of expandable coupon list feature on Sales page. All core functionality working correctly with proper coupon display, application, and removal.

ui_bugs.issue: Coupon list doesn't collapse when clicking 'View Available Coupons' button again

passed_tests: Coupon button hidden when cart is empty
Coupon button appears when items added to cart showing count (2)
Clicking button expands coupon list successfully
SAVE20 coupon displays with 20% OFF, description, and Min $50
FIXED5 coupon displays with $5 OFF, description, and Min $20
Both coupons enabled when cart subtotal ($90) meets minimum requirements
Clicking FIXED5 coupon applies it automatically
Applied coupon shows in dedicated section with remove button
Discount (-$5.00) calculated and displayed in cart summary
Backend coupon APIs (GET, validate, create, update, delete) all working
Coupon analytics and sales tracking functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix: Make coupon list collapse when clicking 'View Available Coupons' button again (toggle functionality)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core functionality working, 1 minor UI issue)
